extension.summary: Play music from Rdio through Kodi
extension.description: Rdio is a subscription music service which allows you to manage your music collection and playlists, play and download them to various devices and discover new music through your friends and followers. This addon allows you to play music from Rdio through Kodi.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.disclaimer: Requires setup of an Rdio API key (free and fairly easy to do). See instructions at http://bit.ly/rdioxbmc)
extension.broken: Rdio has closed down and this plugin is no longer useful
